nodes.text: Vote Palpatine for Emperor was an Imperial propaganda poster created in 19 BBY. It depicted Palpatine's face, with the words "Vote Palpatine for Emperor" above it, and the words "He's the Only Choice" below it, as well as an asterisk clarifying that he actually is the only choice. The poster was written in High Galactic alphabet and was eventually collected in Yoda's Guide to the Galaxy, a book written by the Jedi Master Yoda during his exile on Dagobah.
Vote Palpatine for Emperor was first mentioned in the 2021 non-canon reference book LEGO Star Wars Yoda's Galaxy Atlas.
